#summary One-sentence summary of this page.
#labels GetArt,API,Artwork

= Introduction =

This API feature returns a list of available artwork types and locations specific to the requested game id in the database.

Accepted arguments for the GetArt.php GET request:
  * id
    # *_Integer_*
    # The numeric ID of the game in our database that you like to fetch artwork details for
    # _example:_ id=910


= Usage Example =

An API call with the numeric id of the game desired:

e.g. _http://thegamesdb.net/api/GetArt.php?id=910_

Returns the Following Response:
{{{
<Data>
<baseImgUrl>http://thegamesdb.net/banners/</baseImgUrl>
